jetpack-related-posts.title: OWC
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: OWC, an AqualisBraemar company and headquartered in London, UK, is a specialised and globally focused technical advisor, engineering and project management consultancy providing independent services to the offshore wind industry.

jetpack-related-posts.title: David Brand | Finance Director (Insurance Services)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: A qualified Chartered Accountant and Economics Graduate, David has a career history spanning 25 years in the marine industry, working for both owners and service providers covering technical services, procurement, consultancy and insurance. Prior to joining the Group in February 2017 as Finance Director for Braemar Technical Services, David has…

jetpack-related-posts.title: LNG
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our engineering team is a world leader in Liquid Natural Gas (LNG) projects providing engineering and consultancy services for liquefaction, export facilities, ship/shore compatibility studies, design, construction oversight, commissioning testing and operation of LNG carriers, LNG barges and LNG bunkering in the marine environment. LNG Ashore: Our team provides technical…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Our Organisations
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar AqualisBraemar is a company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers adjusting, marine, offshore and renewables consultancy services to the energy, shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 48 offices located across 33 countries. Offshore Wind Consultants…

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar is a specialised marine and engineering consultancy focusing on the shallow and deep-water offshore segments of the oil & gas and renewables industries worldwide.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Rig Moving
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our teams are fully experienced with both jack up and floating units. We offer full engineering assessments for site specific location approvals, and provide both Marine Warranty Surveyors and Rigmovers/Towmasters for offshore attendance during rig moves.
